question: Which of the following was the spiritual successor of Qutbuddin Bakhtiar Kaki?
explanation: After the death of Qutbuddin Bakhtiar Kaki in 1235 CE, he was buried in Mehrauli in Delhi. His son, Shaikh Ahmed became the custodian of his shrine, but the honour of becoming his spiritual successor went to Fariduddin Masud, his disciple from Punjab.
